title: OT34: Subthreaddit
summary:
Key ideas
- The author has received complaints about open threads becoming unwieldy and is encouraging people to use the subreddit open thread instead.
- The author is banning comments on this particular open thread to encourage people to use the subreddit open thread.
- The author has implemented a new rule that there is a three-day wait time before politicizing any tragedy.

Key learnings
- Open threads on this platform have become unwieldy.
- There is a subreddit open thread available for people to use.
- There is a new rule against politicizing tragedies for at least three days.

Key questions
- How can the author encourage more people to use the subreddit open thread?
- Will the ban on comments on this open thread be effective in getting people to use the subreddit open thread?
- How will the new rule against politicizing tragedies be enforced?
